name: Casa Magna - Domus Magnus II - Optimus
additionalNotes: Another beauty from industry legend Manuel Quesada, Casa Magna D. Magnus II, displays its opulence with a premium selection of the best aged 100% Nicaraguan tobaccos. Dressed in a deep brown and very oily wrapper from the fertile Jalapa region, this slow burning, medium to full body gem delivers lush top notes of pepper and cedar flavors highlighted with subtle notes of cocoa and nuts.
